input_text:
Job Title: Document Review Paralegal

Location: Huntington Beach, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Legal

Description:
Job Posting: Document Review Paralegal - Mesothelioma CasesLocation: Huntington Beach, CASchedule: Full-time, Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PMSalary: $30-$35 per hourType: Long-term Temporary with potential for Temp-to-HireOverviewAdams & Martin Group has partnered with a consulting firm located in Huntington Beach CA and are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Document Review Paralegal to join our legal team specializing in mesothelioma and construction defect cases. This is a critical role requiring expertise in handling complex legal documents and assisting in case preparation for litigation.Key ResponsibilitiesReview and summarize depositions effectively, ensuring detailed accuracy and relevance to the case.Take and transcribe dictation from legal professionals, converting spoken words into clear and organized written documents.Create comprehensive reports to be included with case briefs, contributing to the overall strategy and support of the litigation team.Manage and organize large volumes of documents, ensuring all materials are readily accessible and properly filed.QualificationsProven experience as a paralegal in document review, particularly in mesothelioma or construction defect litigation preferred. Exceptional legal writing skills, with the ability to produce well-crafted, error-free documents under tight deadlines.Fast and accurate typing skills, with a strong emphasis on grammatical correctness and no tolerance for typos [required]. Familiarity with legal terminology and procedures related to mesothelioma and construction defect cases.Strong organizational and multitasking abilities, with a focus on delivering quality work within specified deadlines.RequirementsMinimum of 2 years of experience as a paralegal, specifically with responsibilities in deposition summarization and legal writing.Certification or degree in paralegal studies from an accredited institution preferred.Proficiency in standard office software and legal case management tools.BenefitsCompetitive hourly rate.Engaging and dynamic work environment.Opportunity for long-term employment and potential permanent placement.Qualified candidates are encouraged to submit their resume and a cover letter outlining their specific experience and qualifications for this role. Join us in providing meticulous legal support that contributes significantly to our client outcomes in challenging and complex cases.
Desired Skills and Experience

Qualifications
* Proven experience as a paralegal in document review, particularly in mesothelioma or construction defect litigation preferred. 
* Exceptional legal writing skills, with the ability to produce well-crafted, error-free documents under tight deadlines.
* Fast and accurate typing skills, with a strong emphasis on grammatical correctness and no tolerance for typos [required]. 
* Familiarity with legal terminology and procedures related to mesothelioma and construction defect cases.
* Strong organizational and multitasking abilities, with a focus on delivering quality work within specified deadlines.


All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, national origin, age, ancestry, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, disability, medical condition, genetic information, pregnancy, or military or veteran status. We consider all qualified applicants, including those with criminal histories, in a manner consistent with state and local laws, including the City of Los Angeles' Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Document Review Paralegal
output_json.summary: A Document Review Paralegal position is available at a consulting firm in Huntington Beach, CA.
job_responsibilities: Take and transcribe dictation from legal professionals.
Create comprehensive reports for case briefs.
Manage and organize large volumes of documents.
benefits: Opportunity for long-term employment and potential permanent placement.
output_json.company_information: Adams & Martin Group has partnered with a consulting firm located in Huntington Beach CA.
